message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're on a budget, but I have to make a profit. I can do $165, but that's as low as I can go for now.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $165 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $150?
